Overall recommend this game, gameplay is decent, the new graphics and animations are really good and each game can be different because of the variety of killers.

One thing that's annoying about the gameplay though is the devs decided to cap it at 62 fps. You used to be able to change the game files to allow uncapped fps but the game tends to boot you out now if you do that, I changed the files a while ago but every now and then I'll have to validate files through steam. I downloaded Dbd on a laptop too but it seems like they've made it harder to do, I don't know why they don't want you playing above 60fps... people pay extra money for 120+ hz monitors so they can have smoother running games.

I still enjoy the game though and would recommend others to play it, they just need to add more customisation for the gameplay options instead of having it so limited.

Given time, the game has improved significantly. All complains in my initial review of the game have been addressed. My first review was made prior to the introduction of the Huntress, with her inclusion queue times have been greatly reduced. Further additions to the killer roster have also helped this issue. It's a lot more balanced and the killer has a fighting chance. The developer has been on a streak of very good killer concepts (The Clown and The Spirit), being good at the chase whilst adding something of their own into a match. 

With all this in mind I can happily say I recommend the game. The base game is well worth the money and a definitely fun experience with friends.

Should still be early access because of the state it is in. Sometimes, more often than not, impossible to play with friends due to errors. Please stop releasing dlc and fix the game. When that happens this will change to a positive review.

EDIT: Got a dual monitor set up now, impossible to play dbd unless i disconnect one of them as mouse drift takes me to the other screen and dbd minimizes. Fun fun fun...

EDIT2: Survive with friends fixed, but now you get into a lobby and disconnect for no reason, losing your offering in the process. Also facecamping, cmon now. Survivors get crows for sitting in one spot for too long, why no slap on the wrist for face camping??? My opinion still holds that dlc should stop being spewed out and issues fixed... BTW I am fine with patrolling/camping, but facecamping is just frustrating.

EDIT3: Pretty good, a couple broken things but most things have been polished out

Il gioco è bello ed è una bell'idea, ma purtroppo è afflitto da TANTI, TANTI BUG, soprattutto nel matchmaking che è praticamente rotto.

My most played game not sure if its my fav but i like it for what it is. In the begining off playing the game i would say the first 150 hrs or less you will tryhard trying to survive and fail countless times. Ýou will get scared when myers comes behind u from nowhere and stabs you from behind. But as time goes you start getting bored and you lose that feel that you had in the begining so you start derping around, then thats boring so you start saving everyone, but then that gets boring so you do generators all the time but ofcourse that gets boring. And the cycle continues with ne things all the time. I would say dead by daylight is worth 19,99 saying ive played 577 hrs on it. But its glitchy its unfair and you will get frustrated. I must say though i have never had this much fun playing with friends i can say pretty much all my nearest friends are from this game so it has a special place in my hearth. I do recomend dead by daylight but i warn you you might get very frustrated.

Questo gioco ha superato il limite. L'ho sempre difeso poichè il main concept è fantastico, originale. Ma non è sviluppato a dovere, sembra fatto con i piedi in molti casi. L'ho sempre difeso sul serio, nonostante le valanghe di bug (sia in game che anche NEL MENU'). NONOSTANTE TUTTO QUESTO io lo avrei sempre consigliato perchè in fin dei conti il divertimento lo offre, ma ora ha toccato il fondo. Se prima era un "lobby simulator" ora non è neppure quello! Non si può più giocare! Ti kicka fuori dalle lobby con un "Connection error" INESISTENTE che dei normali sviluppatori correggerebbero in nemmeno 1 millisecondo e invece a distanza di 2 GIORNI, si, 2 GIORNI, questo problema persiste, non permettendomi di giocare. Cari sviluppatori, svegliatevi, o perderete l'intera community e questo gioco arriverà dal posto in cui sembra esser stato concepito al momento: LA PATTUMIERA.

At this point, Dead by Daylight has become a joke in my eyes, every time I see an update I get the slightest bit excited until I realize that the glaring issues still haven't been fixed.  Dev streams gloss over major topics with a joking tone, and at this point I just can't stand to see one of my favorite games be at such a low point in it's career.

I guess what I'm trying to say is, it's just not nearly as fun as it used to be, it's turned less into "are you good at this game" and more into "are you good at following the meta"

Overall, I still have hopes for this game, and if you still enjoy it that's fine, I enjoy it as well, but the community as well as devs have pushed me away to the point in which I can't stand it any more.

生存者メインですが、ごくごく稀にキラープレイ（ノーデス）もします。
接続するサーバーによるのでしょうが、マッチ終了後にキラーさんや生存者の人達と楽しかったね！と言い合えるマッチがあるのが非常に魅力的です。ドキドキした後の清々しい感覚です。

生存者でプレイする場合は幾つか接続先を変えてみて、自分のスタイルに合う地域を探してみるといいと思います。
私はUSに1か所とUS以外で１か所でやってます、マッチングしずらかったりする時もサーバー変えてみたりして遊んでます。

キラープレイの場合は、海外サーバーだと生存者側に迷惑（ラグ）がかかるので国内・アジアサーバーが良いでしょうね。
初めてやる時はLv１５まではかなり厳しいと思いますが、Lv１５（パークが2個付けられる）から段々楽になってきますので、もしその辺りで心折れそうになっている方がいたら、もうちょっとだけやってみて下さい！
後は開幕時は我慢して近くの発電機から離れて少し遠目の発電機を目指してゆっくり歩いてみると、開幕のファーストフックは避けられるかもしれません！
心音が聞こえたら、怖いけど近くの物陰に隠れてやり過ごすのが生存率あがります、焦って走ると（私がよくやります）足跡みられてすぐに追いかけられます。
はっきりと見つかるまでは「歩く」のが一番だと思います＾＾

私自信、フックに吊られまくりなので偉そうな事は言えませんが。＾＾；

怖いけど楽しいDbD、アクション苦手でド下手な私も、ふとしたキラーさんの優しさや、最後に仲間を助けて脱出する時の緊張感が堪らず遊びまくっています！

これから始めようと思ってる方は是非楽しんで！
序盤で諦めかけてる方いたら、DbDには不思議な魅力があるので、もうちょっとやってみましょう！＾＾

Previous Review:

I'd love to write a review, but I'd have to connect to the internet first.

Anyone who voted this game up either played a way earlier, more stable build of the game which I doubt, or is fanboi'd themselves up and made a stand. This game is a hot mess, constant lobby issues, constant reports of being not connected to the internet, contstant BM from killers and survivors alike.

For what it is worth, when actually playing the game and not recieving BM from a toxic community, it's a really solid game that I enjoyed a lot. But it's not worth fighting through 15 minutes of trying to connect to a lobby for a game to only be trolled by a killer who knocks the last two players down and walks around.

De 10 partidas que intentas iniciar 9 se caen; se cierra, se devuelve al menú de inicio, dice que no hay internet o solo se queda pegado en la pantalla de carga. El juego es bueno, pero funciona como la mierda.

Not worth it in its current state. No dedicated servers and usually unbalanced teams/perks. Half the time I play with friends the system will kick us from the group during matchmaking and force the host to exit the program entirely. Too many glitches in the whole menu system they have in place. Get this game only if you enjoy lag induced madness. (and no, it doesn't matter if you pay for amazing internet. If the host is running off an ancient pc or has poor internet then everyone suffers). It also features pay-to-win DLC's.

Dead by Daylight-это темные страшные до муражки карты. Это то место где любой маньяк похож на урода, который не дает тебе выжить после починки всех генераторов.Игра самая лучшая в виде хоррора , это тот хоррор где можно издеваться над маньком , бегать целую игру от него пока другие заводят генераторы. Но это не вечно рано или позно он тебя посадит на крюк , и ты будешь ждать пока тебя спасут и ты убежишь за ворота . Оценка10/10.

Jogo a cada vez que atualiza mais bugado fica. quando acha a partida fica um loading infinito. 
ao entrar na partida é bom você testar o ping do killer tenta escrever algumas coisas rapidas no chat como 3  2 1 etc para testar ou entao baixe o programa MLGA para saber exatamene o ping do killer .
e tem alguns desbalanceamentos , perks roubados e tal.
jogo super divertido de jogar , e quando vc pega o jeito não quer mais parar. quer evoluir com todos personagem e pegar todos seus perks "roubados" como auto cura , arrancada explosiva , ataque decisivo etc. 
tirando o fato de alguns killers simplesmente ser camper ( oque tira totalmente a graça do jogo) . 
conclusão: Jogo tem principios otimos . falta só a empresa da mais visão e suporte ao jogo. certos bug's ridiculos como impossivel você entrar na partida para jogar . como estava um tempo atrás. e nesse exato momento você poem para buscar a partida na hra de entrar, simplesmente fica um loading infinito e nunca carrega. você é obrigado a fechar o jogo e ficar sem jogar. e esperar a boa vontade do desenvolvedores para arrumar. sabe se la quando isso vai acontecer né!

EDIT: Jogo esta melhorando, acho que os devs então mais de olho agora! bug e atualizações vindo sempre que possivel! Otimo jogo para passar tempo e se divertir. RECOMENDO!
EDIT²: Jogo melhorou bastante do que era antigamente super recomendo o jogo. So falta agora eles fazerem uma party para que você não tenha que ficar invitando seus amigos sempre que acaba a partida.

Очень качественный проект, скажу я вам. Разрабы дружат с руками! Эх, их бы на доработку DayZ кинуть так и вообще отлично было бы =) Но то лирика. Итак, к делу.

ПЛЮСЫ:
- графика очень приятная, дизайнеру - респект!
- уровни вылизаны и качественно проработаны.
- геймплей за маньяка и выжившего отличаются, что разнообразивает игровой процесс.
- наличие интересной системы прокачки.

МИНУСЫ:
- атмосфера с каждой игрой стремительно падает, т.к. начинаешь смотреть на игру с точки зрения тактики, забивая на всякого рода эмоции и переживания (это для меня лично огромнейший минус, т.к. я ценю прежде всего атмосферу в играх и те эмоции, которые они мне дарят). За 3 часа игры от атмосферы не осталось ничего! 

Игра однозначно стоит своих денег для тех, кто ищет адреналинового раша! Для тех же, кто ищет атмосферности - лучше купить игру на распродаже (я так и сделал, собственно говоря). Но, в любом случае, купить игру стоит, т.к. она дарит очень необычный опыт своим игрокам.

Nachdem ich ziemlich viel Zeit mit diesem Spiel verbracht habe und auch schon von Anfang an dabei bin, kann ich sagen, dass das Spiel mich von Anfang gepackt hat und dies noch immer tut. Die Community von dem Spiel ist super, man trifft eine Menge netter Leute, mit der du eine Dead by Daylight-Gruppe machen kannst. Durch dieses Spiel habe ich viele Menschen kennengelernt, mit denen ich noch heute Dead by Daylight spiele. Generell bietet das Spiel zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, mit verschiedenen Perk-Kombinationen, Add-Ons und Opfergaben (Offerings), was zur angenehmer Abwechslung führt. Das Spiel ist für mich das perfekte Horrorszenario, mit gut eingesetzten Effekten, Musik und Stimmen. Auch wenn das Spiel manchmal zum Ragen, sowie Flamen animiert, wenn du beispielsweise auf Camper triffst, gibt es eher die guten Runden, in denen du viele Punkte erzielst und am Ende sogar einen Freund aus der Runde mitnimmst.
Seit ich mir das Spiel am 24.06.2016 gekauft habe, ist das Spiel durch diverse Veränderungen gegangen, die nicht immer unbedingt gut waren, doch sie haben immer den roten Faden im Auge behalten, um es den Spielern so spannend und packend wie möglich zu machen. 
An diesem Spiel gibt es für mich nichts auszusetzen.

Игра ТОП!!! Очень понравилась с первых же минут игры!)
А если тебе она не понравилась значит ты криворукий мудак)
И не надо все слваливать на баги и кривой бланас! 
10из10

Nach ca. 1000 Spielstunden in Dead by Daylight kann ich nur sagen, dass dieses Spiel echt der Hammer ist!! Das Spiel ist zudem nicht teuer, zwar sind die DLCs etwas unnötig (aufgrund Extrakosten), aber man braucht sie nicht zwingend um Spaß am Spiel zu haben. Das Spiel kann für einen Anfänger schon schwer sein, aber man findet sich recht leicht ein in der Welt von Dead by Daylight. Es gibt zwar immer noch einige Probleme bei dem Spiel, da es ziemlich nervig ist, wenn man einen Camper als Killer hat oder der Killer regelrecht auf den Tod wartet, dass ist allerdings nicht sehr schlimm, da es viele gute Runden gibt. Als Killer hat man auch eine Vielfalt an Möglichkeiten wie man spielen möchte, da jeder seine eigenen Fähigkeiten hat. Es gibt schon sehr viele Momente indem das Spiel nervt, allerdings würde ich das Spiel dennoch empfehlen, da es sehr viel Spaß macht. Zudem hat dieses Spiel auch eine größtenteils freundlich und hilfsbereite Community, die sich auch für andere Opfern, obwohl sie sie nicht kennen. Immer noch ein tolles Spiel nach 4 Jahren.

Наиграл уже вроде бы почти норм часов. Нифига не накопил толком, ну потому что все читеры и вообще только я один Д.Артаньян. Игра все еще заставляет сердце трястись от стража и коленки бьются друг о друга, когда сраный трапер идет натягивать меня на крюк. Не умею мансовать и всегда бегу вперед, в надежде, что я быстрее, но нихуя подобного. Короче игра все еще держит в своей атмосфере, не смотря на колличество часов. Игра кайф. Кайф
很棒的游戏。有基友的时候就玩人，一个人的时候就玩鬼。
Mega geiles game ,muss man gespielt haben :)

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

I do like the premise of Dead by Daylight, I just wish there were more maps and more to do within the map to escape the killer besides repairing generators. It's fun with friends, but after a while gets a tad stale when playing alone.
